gymbattle.Title: No Battles Left
gymbattle.Body: Congratulations! You have beaten all the gym leaders! Check out your badges by using **/badges**.

gymbattle.Title: Not Enough Money
gymbattle.Body: This gym would cost ${0} if you were to be defeated. You only have ${1} available. Fight wild Pokemon using **/spawn** or sell items to gain more money and try again.
